results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/20]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Summer fashions - Guy Laroche presents his new styles on the Dieppe-Newhaven ferry. Machine-tools - international machine-tool biennial. 2. Symphonie - the Franco-German satellite undergoes trials in the Toulouse simulator. 3. The Fire-Arts - the Fire-Arts Salon. 4. Brassai - sketches, canvases, sculptures and tapestries by Brassai. 5. Marcel Marceau - recital by the famous mime.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/16]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: The World Ski Cup - the last ski meet of the 1972 season. The world’s prettiest insects - the collections of Paris’ Museum of Natural History. Urbanism - a new experiment in development planning in the Paris suburb of Ivry. 2. Dam planning - study of hydraulic developments on small scale models in Grenoble. 3. Hit parade - a song by new pop song star Dani. 4. Swiss art in Paris - a contemporary Swiss art show at the Grand Palais.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/14]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Press conference at the Elysee Palace - President Pompidou’s press conference. 2. In the news: The rural population - the latest statistics. University art - architectural decoration by Pillet at the Grenoble Science Faculty. 3. Sagittaire II - new simulated deep-sea trials at the Comex in Marseilles. Gromaire - the work of French painter Marcel Gromaire, who died in 1971.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Polynesia in Paris - discovering Polynesia. School of Architecture - the new Nanterre Faculty School of Architecture. results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Arts and gifts - the Traditional Arts and Gifts salon. Youth by Bernard Buffet - the yearly Buffet exhibition. results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The General de Gaulle Memorial - a small-scale model of the projected monument. The arts - the “Air-France and Art” Exhibition at the Galliera Museum.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/04]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Port installations - a new lock for heavy tankers at Le Havre. Electricity and life - an exhibition to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the French Electricity Administration. 2. Gien crockery - 150th anniversary of the Gien Crockery Works. 3. Artificial plant-breeding - hydroponic plant-growth for arid regions. 4. Tapestries - the story of David and Bathsheba. A unique set of tapestries.
